name: Beyond Blue Mist Demo
description:
The BeyondBlueMist Demo is a platform post-apocalyptic adventure game. The world has been attacked by aliens who are spreading blue mist to destroy humanity. Since aliens are not able to see as humans, the resistance built  filter gates with colored plates to decode.

BBM was developed by CNAP Lab for the Blue Cone Monochromacy Family Foundation, it is currently the only video game that can detect minor, medium or heavy color disease.
